[Emerging Infectious Disease journalISSN: 1080-6059](https://wwwnc.cdc.gov/eid/)

# Food Safety Spotlight

Emerging data on the harm caused by foodborne illnesses underscore the global threats posed by unsafe foods, and the need for coordinated, cross-border action across the entire food supply chain.

#### 2025

Current Issue [Genetic Cluster of Extended-Spectrum β-lactamase–Producing _Klebsiella pneumoniae_ in Humans and Food, Switzerland, 2018–2019](https://wwwnc.cdc.gov/eid/article/31/10/25-0253_article)
Lisandra Aguilar-Bultet et al. Volume 31, Number 10—October 2025
Current Issue [Retrospective Analysis of Historical _Listeria monocytogenes_ Clinical Isolates, New York, USA, 2000–2021](https://wwwnc.cdc.gov/eid/article/31/10/24-1876_article)
Hilal Samut et al. Volume 31, Number 10—October 2025
Current Issue [Multidrug-Resistant pESI-Harboring _Salmonella enterica_ Serovar Muenchen Sequence Type 82 in Poultry and Humans, Israel, 2020–2023](https://wwwnc.cdc.gov/eid/article/31/10/25-0191_article)
Janet Perry et al. Volume 31, Number 10—October 2025
[Community Outbreak of OXA-48–Producing _Escherichia coli_ Linked to Food Premises, New Zealand, 2018–2022](https://wwwnc.cdc.gov/eid/article/31/7/25-0289_article)
Craig N. Thornley et al. Volume 31, Number 7—July 2025
[Genomic Characterization of _Escherichia coli_ O157:H7 Associated with Multiple Sources, United States](https://wwwnc.cdc.gov/eid/article/31/13/24-0686_article)
Joseph S. Wirth et al. Volume 31, Supplement—April 2025
[Effects of Decentralized Sequencing on National _Listeria monocytogenes_ Genomic Surveillance, Australia, 2016–20
